[http://www.steve-m.de/steve/gallerie/motorolawr850g?page=1 Pictures] The default SSID is '''motorola XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex digits of the WLAN MAC address (upper case letters). ==Images== File:Motorola WR850G v1 angled no antenna.jpg|angled, no antenna File:Motorola WR850G v1 front.jpg|front File:Motorola WR850G v1 bottom.jpg|bottom File:Motorola WR850G v1 back.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:Motorola WR850G v1 board top in case.jpg|board top, in case File:Motorola WR850G v1 wireless module.jpg|wireless module File:Motorola WR850G v1 board top.jpg|board top File:Motorola WR850G v1 CPU.jpg|CPU File:Motorola WR850G v1 Switch.jpg|Switch File:Motorola WR850G v1 AC101L.jpg|AC101L File:Motorola WR850G v1 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
